name: Demo: Slime Jumper Adventure
description:
Slime Jumper Adventure is an adventure platform game, where you play as Mr. Slime who must traverse through forests, caves, skies and even space in order to reunite with his family. Can you help guide Mr. Slime through all the crazy obstacles that stand between him and his family? Your skills and patience will be tested.
